context: Hi there. I am fine and yourself?
I'm great, thanks for asking. What kind of movies do you like? Deadpool 2 (2018) was epic! I also would recommend Black Panther (2018)
Not really into comic based movies
What kind of movies do you like? Oh nice!
Hmm. I really liked How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)
A classic would be When Harry Met Sally... (1989) Also a fun one was Knocked Up (2007)
YES! I've been meaning to see that one. Thanks a lot!!
entity: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)
resp: Another classic would be Sleepless in Seattle (1993)
